Texts.Chs: 把^orange;高级基因提取器^reset;带这名科学家。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Advanced Xenolab^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 你能为我进行科学启蒙吗？我表示怀疑。如果你认为你可以，那就造出^orange;高级基因提取器^reset;来证明！
Texts.Eng: Can you out-science me? I doubt it. If you think you can, prove it by bringing me a completed ^orange;Advanced Xeno Lab^reset;!

Texts.Chs: 好吧...我想这样就解决了。既然你光明正大的击败了我，这些^orange;科技卡^reset;就给你了。
Texts.Eng: Well...I guess that settles it. I suck. Since you bested me fair and square, have these ^orange;Tech Cards^reset;
